snippet.title: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Ring of Fates Intro Cinematic HD
snippet.description:
The original cutscene processed with Waifu2x and VirtualDub to increase its quality.

Newer and better version available: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIzkG-xWWD4

Original resolution: 256x191 @ 14.5fps
Final resolution: 1024x764 @ 29fps (interpolated)

I'm not the original author of this cutscene and it belongs to Square Enix. I just improved its quality as a tribute (and I hope that one day a remastered version will be released).

This video shall not be subject to any copyright claims as it was made under the fair use principle.

Nintendo © 2007
Square Enix © 2007
